  index: 'my_index',
  body: {
    mappings: {
      properties: {
        tag: {
          type: 'text',
          fielddata: true,
          fielddata_frequency_filter: {
            min: 0.001,
            max: 0.1,
            min_segment_size: 500
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
